Articles.Content:
Not to my memory.

The user below is breathing.

*evil voice*

I want your soul...

False.

Annnouncement? Yes, must've missed it...

False

The user below me knows the me "Are you f*cking kidding me?".

False, I don't know a "Me" containing that.

The user below me is online when he/she posted that.

Wrong

The user below me developed an affinity for space while viewing the Apollo programs or STS launches

False.

The user below me has had too much cocai... I mean caffeine.

False. I rarely bother with the stuff.

The user below me has a sweet tooth.

I might...

I'm just over 6ft.

The user below is under 5' 5"

5'4". *sigh*

The user below me has watched Arby 'n' the Chief.

I have no idea what that is.

The user below me have watched Terra Nova

I have no idea what that is.

The user below me has watched Neon Genesis: Evangelion.

Yes, but I don't remember there being a : in the name YOU Ã‚Â§$!%)Ã‚Â§"&(#*&%&Ã‚Â§

Seriously, never even having heard of NGE...

nope

Meh... a little...

The user below me likes the fine art of DANCE!!!!!!!

... Yep. Fun stuff, if I could afford lessons. Not always such a "fine" art in my experience, though... hehe.

The user below likes Disney movies.

Only one I like is 101 Dalmatians from 1961.
